Model: BX50A Categories: Restaurant Equipment » Hotel Restaurant Equipment » Description: Specification Dimension(L*W*H) : 820*510*1100mm Voltage : 220V/50Hz Power : 1.1Kw Production : 50L / time N.W:/G.W : 152Kg/186Kg Features 1:Suitable for mixing filling to make dumpling,pie,sausage etc. 2:It can rotate clockwise and anti-clockwise rotate ,completely mix the filling 3:Parts which contact food directly are made by stainless steel,meet international hygienicy standard. 4:With lockable wheel,convenient to move. 5:CE certificate
Note 1. MOQ : 1 set 2. Place of origin : Guangdong China (Mainland) 3. Payment term : T/T , Western Union , L/C 4. Package : Carton ,Wooden case 5. Port of loading : Guangzhou or Shenzhen 6. Shipment : By Sea, By Air, or via DHL, UPS ,TNT,FEDEX,EMS etc.( We'll consider the best way for saving shipment cost ) 7. Shipment date : 15 days after receiving the deposit 8. Warranty period : 1 year 9. Customer service : Lifelong technoly support and accessories supply.
